ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] going thru the archives....
ygData.msgSnippet: I often find myself in a group with a Shaman (who handles haste and slow) AND a ranger/druid - (who handles snare) - in those cases - I whip out my Tambourine
ygData.messageBody:
I often find myself in a group with a Shaman (who handles haste and slow)
AND a ranger/druid - (who handles snare) - in those cases - I whip out my
Tambourine and Dot to my hearts content...

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Kenneth E. Bachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
Sent: Friday, November 17, 2000 2:29 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] going thru the archives....


Well, reading what you wrote, we're probably not as different as you might
think.

I really like the chant series myself, but the tradeoff is that we aren't
singing any party buff or MOB
debuff songs while using it, so whether or not it's a good idea is
situational. I do use them. I don't
use them on large group efforts since I can't get high enough on the hate
list to avoid the DOT bug (no,
it's not fixed).
